alert.note: Alert for Fremont; Mills; Montgomery; Page (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 31 at 6:58AM CDT until April 01 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM CDT SATURDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 7 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WINDS...South winds this morning 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. After 5 pm this afternoon, winds will turn to the west and increase to 30 to 40 mph with gusts as high as 55 mph. * WHEN... This morning`s strong winds will taper before becoming powerful again after 5pm this evening. * TIMING... 5 PM this afternoon through 7 AM Saturday * WHERE...Portions of southwest and west central Iowa and east central, northeast and southeast Nebraska. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
